recipes.rjg_utils::determine_architecture: Sets some node attributes based on the processor architecture of the node (x86 or x64)
recipes.rjg_utils::helloworld: A recipe which should always work, used as a control test
recipes.rjg_utils::set_dns: Sets the DNS search list ot the provided CSV list
recipes.rjg_utils::install_roles_and_features: Installs one or many Windows 2008 roles and features using the rjg_utils::features_and_roles_list as input.
recipes.rjg_utils::install_windowsupdates: Downloads and installs all pending windows updates for the server
recipes.rjg_utils::install_bginfo: Installs the BGInfo tool and sets it to run on each user login
recipes.rjg_utils::default: Adds a powershell function library to the C:\ drive for use by other recipes
recipes.rjg_utils::install_scom_agent: Installs the Microsoft System Center Operations Manager (SCOM) agent using settings from active directory
recipes.rjg_utils::set_hostname: Sets the system's hostname to match the nickname in the RightScale dashboard
recipes.rjg_utils::create_users: Creates or updates a set of users defined in a yaml file stored in an S3 bucket

rjg_utils/dns_list.description: A comma separated list of IPV4 addresses of DNS servers
rjg_utils/dns_list.display_name: A comma separated list of IPV4 addresses of DNS servers

aws/secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws

rjg_utils/scom_share_user.description: The username of a user who has permissions to access the share which contains the SCOM agent.

aws/access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

rjg_utils/scom_share_subdir.description: The subdirectory of the share (if any) which contains the SCOM agent install files.  If your SCOM Share UNC Path is \fileserverSCOMShare, and this is InstallationFilesAgent the full UNC path will be \fileserverSCOMShareInstallationFilesAgent

rjg_utils/bginfo_s3_file.description: The full S3 key to a zip file containing a logon.bgi file, and any files which it depends upon (I.E. like images)

rjg_utils/users_secret_access_key.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve your access identifiers. Ex: XVdxPgOM4auGcMlPz61IZGotpr9LzzI07tT8s2Ws

rjg_utils/hostname.description: The desired hostname for the instance

rjg_utils/scom_share_unc.description: The UNC path of the share containing the SCOM agent installers.  Example: \fileserverSCOMShare

rjg_utils/scom_share_pass.description: The password of a user who has permissions to access the share which contains the SCOM agent.

rjg_utils/custom_bginfo.description: A boolean indicating if a zip file containing a custom bginfo configuration should be download from S3.  If true rjg_utils/bginfo_s3_file and rjg_utils/bginfo_s3_bucket must be set

rjg_utils/users_access_key_id.description: This is an Amazon credential. Log in to your AWS account at aws.amazon.com to retrieve you access identifiers. Ex: 1JHQQ4KVEVM02KVEVM02

rjg_utils/users_file.description: A yaml file containing an array of objects describing local users to be created on the system.

rjg_utils/users_s3_bucket.description: The S3 bucket containing a yaml file describing local users to create

rjg_utils/features_and_roles_list.description: A CSV list of features and roles to install.  To view the list of available roles and features run 'servermanagercmd -query' on a Windows 2008 server instance

name: rjg_utils
long_description:
= TODO
* Make it possible to run windows update in a loop with reboots until no updates are available.  Both for boot & operational
* Tweak the reporting mechanism(s) for windows update.  I.E. Print output to rightscale console or chef log, and allow the email details to be configurable with chef attributes
